words.prompt: When something is _____________ , it is given out as a task.
_____________ is a willingness and happiness to share in an unselfish way.
To do something _____________ is to do it carefully or with extreme caution.
To be _____________ is to show the qualities of being an adult.
_____________ are groups of people who join together for a purpose.
The _____________ are the people who live in a particular place.
To be _____________ is to be spread or thrown about.
When you are _____________ , you are very careful with making choices.
A _____________ is a plan to refuse buying from or dealing with a person, nation, or business.
_____________ is support that inspires hope and confidence.
To _____________ means to carry out or finish.
An _____________ is a lack of justice or fairness.
People who are _____________ are treated badly by others.
People _____________ when they object to something.
A _____________ person has the abilities needed to do something.
Someone who is _____________ had his or her name placed on a list.
_____________ are improvements that move an idea ahead.
_____________ is the science and business of raising crops and farm animals.
_____________ are qualities that identify a person or thing.
A _____________ is a worried interest in something.
To _____________ is to have a different opinion about something.
To _____________ is to receive from a parent or other relative.
When something is _____________ , it is common or widespread.
_____________ is the act of fighting against something.
